column4: does anyone know of a good guide to dualboot (l)ubuntu and windows xp mini on a single flash drive?
You can put a virtual machine on the Ubuntu OS on the USB drive and install windows XP to that.  It will take a ton of space (for a flash drive) the performance will probably not be great.
not a bad idea. might be awful slow though, depending on computer...
Probably :)
Whey not just play pandora on the laptop?
How does the blackberry connect to the laptop?  bluetooth or something?
its over the cell connection and im too cheap to pay for tethering
double male headphone jack from bb into mic in port atm
not really doing anything though....
any ideas?
You can just turn up the volume on that I think.  I don't think you need any special software at all.

Not really.  Other then to mess with all the sound setting guis you can find.  System -> Pref -> Sound
Right click the applet icon.
